title: Colección sobre historia de las vacunas
text:
Colección sobre historia de las vacunas
La vacunación ha contribuido a salvar más vidas que cualquier otra intervención médica en la historia.
La colección
[Nature Milestones in Vaccines](https://www.nature.com/collections/hcajdiajij) proporciona una perspectiva histórica de los avances en el campo destacando los hitos más relevantes, que abarca desde la técnica centenaria de "variolación" hasta las vacunas sintéticas contra el cáncer de la era moderna.
Milestone incluye una línea de tiempo interactiva y dos animaciones explicativas.
Acceda por secciones:
[- Nature Milestones in Vaccines (timeline)
- ](https://www.nature.com/immersive/d42859-020-00005-8/index.html) [The origins of vaccination](https://www.nature.com/articles/d42859-020-00006-7) [-](https://www.nature.com/immersive/d42859-020-00005-8/index.html) [Putting smallpox out to pasture](https://www.nature.com/articles/d42859-020-00007-6) [- The first live attenuated vaccines](https://www.nature.com/articles/d42859-020-00008-5)
-
-
[BCG: to face an ancient enemy](https://www.nature.com/articles/d42859-020-00010-x) [- Alum adjuvant discovery and potency](https://www.nature.com/articles/d42859-020-00011-w) [- Developing the 17D yellow fever vaccine](https://www.nature.com/articles/d42859-020-00012-9) [](https://www.nature.com/articles/d42859-020-00011-w) [- Pertussis: a tale of two vaccines](https://www.nature.com/articles/d42859-020-00013-8) [- Culturing poliovirus in cells](https://www.nature.com/articles/d42859-020-00014-7) [- Two polio vaccines for defeating a paralysing scourge](https://www.nature.com/articles/d42859-020-00015-6) [- First recombinant DNA vaccine for HBV](https://www.nature.com/articles/d42859-020-00016-5) [- The sweet success of conjugate vaccines](https://www.nature.com/articles/d42859-020-00017-4) [- Another layer of protection](https://www.nature.com/articles/d42859-020-00018-3) [- A vaccine to prevent HPV-related cancers](https://www.nature.com/articles/d42859-020-00019-2) [- Vaccinology in reverse](https://www.nature.com/articles/d42859-020-00020-9) [- The quest for a vaccine against malaria](https://www.nature.com/articles/d42859-020-00021-8) [- A dendritic cell cancer vaccine](https://www.nature.com/articles/d42859-020-00022-7) [- Assessing vaccine responses: you’ve got to have a system](https://www.nature.com/articles/d42859-020-00023-6) [- Public trust in vaccines](https://www.nature.com/articles/d42859-020-00024-5) [- Synthetic biology speeds vaccine development](https://www.nature.com/articles/d42859-020-00025-4) [- Individualized neoantigen vaccines](https://www.nature.com/articles/d42859-020-00026-3)
